titleStmt.title: God's arraignment of Adam: declared in a sermon preach'd at St Pauls, Septemb 5. 1658. before the right honorable the Lord Major, aldermen, and Common-Council. By Thomas Cartwright, M.A. of Queens Coll. Oxon. and now vicar of Walthamstow in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Cartwright, Thomas, 1634-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Baker, at the sign of the Peacock in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Thomason copy bound with items from November, 1658.
